
schema = [
                {
            "key": "year",
            "description": "The year for which the financial statement is being reported."
        },
        {
            "key": "sales_total",
            "description": "Total sales revenue generated by the company within the specified period."
        },
        {
            "key": "general_sales_cost",
            "description": "Total expenses incurred in manufacturing, selling, and administrative activities."
        },
        {
            "key": "royalties",
            "description": "Income received from royalties on sales abroad and from the sale of patents."
        },
        {
            "key": "capital_income_total",
            "description": "Total income generated from capital investments."
        },
        {
            "key": "depreciation_buildings",
            "description": "Depreciation expense recorded for buildings, reflecting the loss in value over time."
        },
        {
            "key": "depreciation_machinery",
            "description": "Depreciation expense recorded for machinery, indicating the reduction in value due to usage and age."
        },
        {
            "key": "interest_expense",
            "description": "Total expenses related to interest payments on debts."
        },
        {
            "key": "taxes",
            "description": "Total taxes paid by the company, including income tax and other applicable taxes."
        },
        {
            "key": "net_profit",
            "description": "Net profit earned by the company for the year, calculated as revenues minus expenses, taxes, and other deductions."
        }
]
